title: Next Resistance Level for Gilead Sciences (GILD) is $111.17
content:
Written on Fri, 09/11/2015 - 1:00pm 
 
By Nick Russo 
 
Shares of Gilead Sciences ( NASDAQ:GILD ) opened today above their pivot of $106.54 and have already reached the first level of resistance at $109.21.  Investors may be interested in a cross of the next upside pivot targets of $111.17 and $115.80. 

In the past 52 weeks, Gilead Sciences share prices have been bracketed by a low of $56.25 and a high of $123.37 and are now at $109.26, 94% above that low price.  Over the past week, the 200-day moving average (MA) has remained constant while the 50-day MA has declined 0.6%. 

Gilead Sciences ( NASDAQ:GILD ) has potential upside of 18.8% based on a current price of $109.26 and analysts' consensus price target of $129.79.  Gilead Sciences shares should encounter resistance at the 50-day moving average (MA) of $112.75 and support at its 200-day MA of $106.64. 

SmarTrend recommended that its subscribers protect gains by selling shares of Gilead Sciences on July 8th, 2015 by issuing a Downtrend alert when the shares were trading at $113.41. Since that call, shares of Gilead Sciences have fallen 5.4%.  We are now looking for when a new Uptrend will commence and will alert SmarTrend subscribers in real time. 
   
 Keywords:  pivot alerts Gilead Sciences 
 
 Ticker(s):   GILD
